ygData.msgSnippet: you dont need to go to a different planet to need to aquire beast modes and vehicles modes. The original transformers had Vehicle modes. You apparently have

you dont need to go to a different planet to need to aquire beast modes and 
vehicles modes. The original transformers had Vehicle modes. You apparently 
have seen much G1 or else you would no that. And nothing would be biased. 
Small factions of Maximals would be united under one banner, ditto For 
Predacons and Decepticons, and everything else. Noone would be biased. Things 
would be much better as noone would continue to attack each other over and 
over. Senidng them to a different planet would ultimately create the same 
problem now, eventually nothing would develop other than fights.

--part1_c5.1999564b.292d7a10_boundary
